properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 5:18PM PST until January 8 at 5:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Rough bar conditions expected.

- GENERAL SEAS...Around 10 ft this evening then near 8 to 9 ft
tonight and Wednesday.

- FIRST EBB...Around 245 AM Wednesday. Seas to 11 ft with
breakers possible.

- SECOND EBB...Strong ebb around 3 PM Wednesday. Seas to 12 ft
with breakers likely.

* WHERE...In the Main Channel of the Columbia River Bar.

* WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening, then from midnight tonight
to 5 AM PST Wednesday, and from 11 AM to 5 PM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft especially
when navigating in or near harbor entrances.
properties.instruction:
Small craft should use extreme caution when navigating in or near
harbor entrances.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 5 PM PST WEDNESDAY
